name: Hermit Crab Adventure
description:
An adventure of a hermit crab trapped in an unknown island

How to Play :

  • Arrows - Movement
  • Z - Dig
  • X - Punch
  • C - Change Shell
  • V - Use Shell

Created by :

Finiko Kasula Novenda

Music by :

Lazuardi Firdaus (Lazuli Sound (https://soundcloud.com/lazulisound))
